  • Constructor Details

    • ManagerController

      public ManagerController(IUserService userService, IProjectService projectService, IApplicationService applicationService, IOfficerRegistrationService officerRegistrationService, IEnquiryService enquiryService, User currentUser, Scanner scanner, AuthController authController)
      Constructs a new ManagerController. Instantiates and holds references to all the specialized manager sub-controllers, passing necessary dependencies (services, user, scanner, auth controller) to them.
      Parameters:
      userService - Service for user data access.
      projectService - Service for project data access.
      applicationService - Service for application data access.
      officerRegistrationService - Service for officer registration data access.
      enquiryService - Service for enquiry data access (needed by multiple sub-controllers).
      currentUser - The currently logged-in User (expected to be HDBManager).
      scanner - Scanner instance for reading user input.
      authController - Controller for authentication tasks.
